title: Well, I can't open league///
body: Logo stuck on screen tried so many things game just won't open

replies.body:
Now I deleted it and the game won't launch... the logo is gone from the background and I tried reinstalling etc etc

Guess I'll try out Dota 2 even though I have never played it and I've played league of legends for 5 years now... if Dota 2's client won't fuck me over and runs better I should just do that, since this problem happened to others years ago and riot can't seem to stop this problem happening.

I started it last night and then tried to relaunch it and had this problem ever since, so now I'm done with it.
Me too the image of lol keeps jumping and it wont fucking open im sooo mad. thinking of going to dota 2

This can happen when your patcher isn't allowed by your pc settings to open.  Reinstalling or deleting content won't really solve this, and can actually cause more issues.  You should check out the steps in the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to restore that access.  Let me know if you have any questions!
